Title: Prohibits an assistant district attorney from running for certain public offices, unless such individual first resigns from current employment
Summary: Prohibits an assistant district attorney from running for public office, other than the office of district attorney or a position as a judicial officer who is authorized to preside over a court of record, unless such individual first resigns from his or her public employment.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting an assistant district attorney from running for certain public offices, unless such individual first resigns from current employment
